ygData.subject: Factions (was Mask of Deception)
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of factions.... Forgive this somewhat off-bard-topic question but this is the only EQ mailing list I subscribe to and I think there is an easy answer.
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of factions....

Forgive this somewhat off-bard-topic question but this is the only EQ
mailing list I subscribe to and I think there is an easy answer. This is
related to the faction discussion we are having.

As a Troll Shaman who worships Cazic, exactly what do I have to kill to get
enough faction to walk into Freeport and not be KOS?

Anyone know this?

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, February 02, 2000 12:20 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mask of Deception
>
>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 2 Feb 2000, Papa Legba wrote:
> >
> > My enchanter (dark elf atheist) can walk through felwithe unmolested
> > with the hal elf illusion...
>
> Yes, contrary to the "difficulty" ratings Verant gave each
> class/race/diety, it is much much much easier for evil
> characters to become non-KOS to good classes/racese/dieties
> than vice versa.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>>
